programme.desc: Roni was looking for his missing nephew with the police. It turned out that her nephew was helped by Wati, but Roni accused Wati of kidnapping her nephew. It got to the point that the odong-odong was no longer in demand because mothers were afraid that their children would be kidnapped by Wati. Wati did not accept this and tried to take revenge on Roni.

programme.title: SSTTT SI PALING MOTORAN GAK DIAJAK
programme.desc: Rara is a motorcycle gang member who is inaugurating a motorcycle club in Puncak but there is an incident where Dudung's goat escapes and Rara becomes Amnesia, on that occasion Dudung tries to bring Rara home, utilizing her to sell and graze goats, but over time feelings for each other arise and fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 343
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Rekayasa Cinta Dokter Cantik No Play Play
programme.desc: Angel (Zoe Abbas), who is constantly pressured by her mother to get married, finally takes the practical route by claiming to be the lover of her patient who suffers from amnesia. Angel's two best friends don't agree with her idea, but they end up supporting her. Angel says she will soon marry the man whose real name is Marcel (Bryan McKenzie) because Angel claims to be Marcel's fiancée before Marcel has amnesia.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 329
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 3
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: BIDUAN GEROBAK DANGDUT TRENDING
programme.desc: Mira, a beautiful woman from Kampung Dangdut, works as a "ngangon goat" worker. Feeling talented in singing dangdut, Mira auditioned to sing dangdut in her village, even though the pungent smell of goats on her body was not a barrier to auditioning. However, her father did not approve, even though Mira had a very melodious voice. How would Mira continue her talent as a dangdut singer despite her goat odor? Will she continue to "ngangon kambing"?

But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 4
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: PREMAN GEMOY ALAH SIA BOY
programme.desc: Jamilah was snatched by Boy, the head thug, but who would have thought they would be in the same fate.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 344
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Perawat Cinta Cantiknya Gak Ada Obat
programme.desc: Dimas (Kenny Austin) has just been in a single car accident that resulted in a broken leg bone. programme.title: Travel With Mommy: Misi Anak Mak - EP 1
programme.desc: Saksikan kekecohan Dato' Sri Siti Nurhaliza, Bell Ngasri, Nubhan, Harris Anuar, Sharifah Shahirah & Liza Abdullah melancong bersama ahli keluarga mereka dalam Travel With Mommy: Misi Anak Mak!

programme.title: Abang Tinted & Handbag Ajaib
programme.desc: Kisah seorang lelaki yang kehilangan segalanya selepas ditipu rakan niaganya, tapi diselamatkan oleh tas tangan ‘ajaib’ yang mempunyai jalan penyelesaian kepada semua masalah.

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 5
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menampilkan selebriti Malaysia bersama anak-anak mereka di dapur, dengan citarasa Malaysia diselitkan resipi untuk diikuti oleh semua penonton.

programme.title: Raja Lubuk - EP 5
programme.desc: Raja Lubuk adalah pengembaraan Joe Aziz untuk mempelajari dan mendalami teknik memancing bersama seorang "Raja Lubuk". Dia akan menjelajah ke lubuk-lubuk ikan yang terdapat di Malaysia.

programme.title: Jesnita - EP 19
programme.desc: Electra mahu Aidil membantunya untuk menyisat tentang Abdullah Sani dan Temenggung Emas. Syafinaz ajar Dayana mahu perangkap Rafael dengan kandungannya. Pertengakaran berlaku antara Rafael dan Jesnita.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO - EP 8
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Rahsia Hati Perempuan - EP 24
programme.desc: Mikael, Zayn & Ilaina adalah kawan baik semenjak kecil. Ilaina dan keluarga telah berpindah ke Australia. Berputik cinta antara mereka dan siapakah Arissa?

programme.title: Unplugged Ria 2019 - EP 21
programme.desc: Persembahan artis-artis tempatan dengan gabungan lagu baru dan lama bersama hos Elly Arifin dalam membongkar rahsia di sebalik pembikinan lagu tersebut.

programme.title: Mr London Ms Langkawi - EP 7
programme.desc: Aidid yang di besarkan di luar negara bertemu sepupunya Nana, yang berjiwa besar cintakan tanah air. Walaupun mereka sering berselisih pendapat namun akhirnya disatukan atas kehendak keluarga.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti - EP 23
programme.desc: Mengisahkan percintaan yang penuh dengan emosi dan dugaan antara Ara dan Ashraf.

programme.title: Halal Maps - EP 4
programme.desc: Menampilkan sajian kulinari seluruh dunia, Halal Maps menemui penduduk tempatan yang berkongsi hidangan Halal kegemaran di bandar mereka, di mana mendapatkannya dan bagaimana menuju ke sana.

programme.title: Movie - Hero
programme.desc: Shakthi, a young man, helps Mathi, a student, exhibit her invention at an educational fair. However, when they both are falsely accused of a patent violation, he sets out to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Movie - James Bond
programme.desc: James and Pandu are porters and very good friends. They get appointed by the owner and the manager of a chit fund to steal money, but later fall into a trap.

programme.title: Movie - Saathikku Oru Neethi
programme.desc: Saathikku Oru Neethi is a 1981 Tamil-language action film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar, starring Vijayakanth and Swapna in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sankar Ganesh.

programme.title: Movie - Iniyallam Sugame
programme.desc: Arvind and Nandini meet in a singing competition and instantly fall in love with each other. Their lives take a turn when his friend Nirmala develops feelings for him.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Archana IAS
programme.desc: A widow brings up her daughter Archana by being a strict mother. The girl succeeds in passing the IAS exams and becomes a collector to take revenge on the man who cheated her mother.

programme.title: Movie - Vanga Partner Vanga
programme.desc: Three villagers go to Chennai to become rich and promise Lord Ganapathi a quarter of their profit if he becomes their partner. However, when the time comes for them to pay him, they refuse to do so.

programme.title: Movie - Mouna Geethangal
programme.desc: A woman divorces her husband after she learns of his illicit affair. When she discovers that she is pregnant, she moves to a new town to start life afresh. Ten years later, they meet again.

programme.title: Movie - Idhayam
programme.desc: A medical student from a small town falls in love with one of his classmates. However, a series of circumstances combined with his own shyness keep him from expressing his feelings to her.

programme.title: Movie - Zombie
programme.desc: Tired of their day-to-day lives, three friends decide to go on a vacation where they encounter zombies and meet a girl while running for their lives.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Kalluriyin Kadhai
programme.desc: After graduating, a young man and a girl, who are in love with each other, promise to meet again after five years in their college campus. When he does show up on the set day, his friends are shocked to see that he has completely changed.

programme.title: Movie - Sivanda Kangal
programme.desc: An honest police officer bravely fights against industrialists who commit various atrocities. Even after resigning, he takes on the notorious businessman Chakravarty.

programme.title: Movie - MGR Nagaril
programme.desc: Four men try to impress a young woman who is investigating her brother's murder. However, when they pretend to be the dead man's friends, they get into deep trouble.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sinam
programme.desc: Danny, who works in a bar in Thailand, often dreams about the murder of three people, which include a businessman, an air hostess and a politician. He decides to unravel the mystery behind his dreams.

programme.title: Movie - Coimbatore Mappillai
programme.desc: Balu comes to the city for better opportunities and stays with his friend. He falls in love with Sumithra, his landlord, but her evil cousin Mahesh creates a rift between them.

programme.title: Movie - Makkal Veeran
programme.desc: Ganga, a camerawoman, helps Rambabu, a fiery mechanic, to become a journalist. When an evil politician Ranababu kills reputed journalist Surya, Rambabu decides to destroy his political career.

programme.title: Movie - Sippikkul Muthu
programme.desc: Sivayya, a person with autism, lives in a village with his grandmother. Things take a turn when he marries a widow, Lalitha, in order to save her from the atrocities of widowhood.

programme.title: Movie - Satyam
programme.desc: Sathyam, a cop, doesn't believe in finishing criminals in fake encounters but in a judicial way. A powerful politician hires an assassin to get rid of his competitors. Sathyam is assigned to the case.

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group F: Germany vs Great Britain
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: Eschborn-Frankfurt is an annual semi classic cycling race in Germany, starting in Eschborn and finishing in Frankfurt. The event, sometimes referred to as the Frankfurt Grand Prix, is held annually on 1 May, national Labour Day in Germany. The event was first held on 1 May 1962. The race passes through the Taunus Hills west of Frankfurt, along a winding and hilly course with around 1500m (5,000 feet) of climbing.

programme.title: Badminton Unlimited 2025
programme.desc: Catch all the happenings in and around the world of badminton here on the show Badminton Unlimited.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-21 (Final) (John Higgins vs Xiao Guodong)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: Women’s tennis has been a mainstay of Eastbourne since 1974’s inaugural Eastbourne Open. The tournament is played on outdoor grass courts, and is generally considered a "warm-up" for the Wimbledon Championships. Some of the world's finest female tennis talent will head to Devonshire Park to compete for the prize purse of USD$142,000. Martina Navratilova holds the record for the most singles titles with 11

programme.title: World Cup of Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Cup of Darts is the 15th edition of the PDC World Cup of Darts and it is staged by the Professional Darts Corporation. It will take place at the Eissporthalle in Frankfurt, Germany. The tournament consists of 40 teams and the total prize money is to remain at £450,000.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: Hologic WTA All Access 2025
programme.desc: This show brings you compelling stories, player personalities, tournament colour and fan engagement as well as exclusive analysis of statistical trends and data.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Presidential Cycling Tour of Turkey is a professional road bicycle racing stage race held annually in Turkey since 1963. 2025 will be the 60th edition and it will host 23 teams on its historical course . 161 cyclists will compete on the heavenly roads of Türkiye for 8 days, 8 stages, 1,153 km from the Mediterranean to the Aegean.

programme.title: Badminton Weekly 2025
programme.desc: Badminton Weekly discusses about the standout moments from the tour, as well as insights, unforgettable matches and close shaves as players make their final push to become champion in their own right.

programme.desc: 126 riders from 21 teams will compete for the yellow jersey of the 46th Tour de Hongrie. programme.desc: Once part of a dominant Manchester United side in the 1990s, Peter Schmeichel is one of the Premier League's most decorated goalkeepers. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.desc: PL Stories takes an intimate look at the controversial and charismatic career of Nicklas Bendtner, exploring his rise to fame and the challenges that came with it. With 347 top-flight appearances under his best, Konchesky reflects on his illustrious career to select his ultimate line-up of teammates. Expect bold choices a surprising inclusion, and a formation designed to deliver one thing... goals, goals, goals.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: We explore Arsene Wenger's managerial journey before joining Arsenal, tracing his evolution from a young, innovative coach in France to a transformative force in European football. We highlight the key moments that led him to one of football's most iconic roles.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode, the athletes head to the Johannesburg Stock Exchange for a fight pick challenge. The top two draft picks face-off in the TF2 quarterfinals for what turns out to be a nail-biting bout.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Seren Cetin
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender and undefeated challenger Seren Cetin of Turkey. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Takakeisho, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Mitakeumi.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode, the athletes head to the Johannesburg Stock Exchange for a fight pick challenge. The top two draft picks face-off in the TF2 quarterfinals for what turns out to be a nail-biting bout.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Erik Morales vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is an interim WBA light welterweight title fight between Erik Morales and Marcos Maidana that gave Maidana a chance to leap back into the boxing title scene, while Morales provided fans with a vintage performance. Also on the card, action from WBO welterweight champ Carlos Quintanta.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Terunofuji, Asanoyama, Takayasu and Wakatakakage.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: FS MMA Jake Shields vs. Ray Steinbeiss
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! In sunny Costa Rica, Jake Shields takes on Ray "Ipswich Cobra" Steinbeiss in a technical chess match that spells victory for only one man.

programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Erik Morales vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is an interim WBA light welterweight title fight between Erik Morales and Marcos Maidana that gave Maidana a chance to leap back into the boxing title scene, while Morales provided fans with a vintage performance. Also on the card, action from WBO welterweight champ Carlos Quintanta.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Terunofuji, Asanoyama, Takayasu and Wakatakakage.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: FS MMA Jake Shields vs. Ray Steinbeiss
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! In sunny Costa Rica, Jake Shields takes on Ray "Ipswich Cobra" Steinbeiss in a technical chess match that spells victory for only one man.

programme.title: WCCB Emmanuel Rodriguez vs. Melvin Lopez
programme.desc: From the MGM National Harbor in Oxon Hill, Maryland, a main event showdown between two of the world's top bantamweights, Emmanuel Rodriguez and Melvin Lopez, will decide the IBF Bantamweight World Champion. Rodriguez (21-2) is a former world champion, enters the bout off a victory over undefeated Gary Antonio Russell, and now sits at #2 in the world rankings according to the IBF.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Competitors head to the Midwest to try and qualify for a shot at the American Ninja Warrior title. Can the athletes handle two new obstacles including a rope swing and double tilt ladder?

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Meisei, Tsurugisho, Kotonowaka and Tobizaru.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, in one of his toughest fights yet, challenging Miguel Cotto for the WBA super light middleweight title, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 8

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 130
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 90
programme.desc: The start of a new financial year brings new hope and opportunity. What's in store for business owners, borrowers, retirees, employees and the markets? Plus there's only one week until the RBA's next interest rate decision.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Alps S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Australia might be world famous for its outback and red deserts, but there are also lush alpine regions that are just as unique and breathtaking and play a central role to the animals living along the east coast.

programme.title: The First Inventors S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Indigenous knowledge teams up with cutting-edge science to develop lifesaving medicines and combat climate change. But to tackle humanity's future challenges, first we need to heal the past.

programme.title: Way Out Ag (2021) - EP 6
programme.desc: Natural wine, low-fi wine, or wine made with minimal additives was initially dismissed as a fad. But this small-scale winemaking style is having an outsized impact on the wine scene, as Landline reported in 2021.

programme.title: Australian Story (2025) - EP 18
programme.desc: Rachael "Raygun" Gunn broke the internet with her Olympic routine, sparking countless memes and vitriolic abuse. A year on, Australian Story asks what the hell was that all about?

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 102
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 131
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 131
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 131
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: National Press Club Address (2025) - EP 22
programme.desc: Sitiveni Rabuka, Prime Minister of Fiji, addresses the National Press Club of Australia.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 22
programme.desc: We examine the chaos, confusion, uncertainty and fear generated by Trump's so-called reciprocal tariffs, which experts say will increase the cost of living, make the US poorer and the world a less prosperous and secure place.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 21
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: I Was Actually There S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: A massive earthquake below the Indian Ocean unleashed the deadliest tsunami in history, killing 230,000 people. Those who were swept up in the wave had no idea of its scale, only of the devastation that unfolded before them.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Young professionals Stuart and Monique Cormack are desperate to reinvent their tiny, neglected backyard. Will their big dreams fit their pint-sized, terrace garden?

programme.title: Chopsticks Or Fork? S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Tina and Andy, recent arrivals to Australia from Guangzhou, saw an irresistible work opportunity and took over the Pagoda Restaurant in Atherton. Andy cooks Sweet & Sour Pork with fresh Queensland pineapple.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 113
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien (2025) - EP 113
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 61
programme.desc: Comedy genius Nina Oyama and culinary genius Matt Stone join Adam for an all taste, no waste spectacular!

programme.title: Heywire (2022) - EP 2
programme.desc: Heywire winner Charlotte loves living in the Gibson desert. But she hates seeing the devastating impact feral camels have on sacred sites.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 20
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC National News (2025) - EP 183
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies. Accompany each lives with pleasure and joy every single day. Eat Around Indonesia takes people to taste delicious foods around Indonesia. Indonesian famous culinary will be known even wider.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies. Accompany each lives with pleasure and joy every single day. Eat Around Indonesia takes people to taste delicious foods around Indonesia. Indonesian famous culinary will be known even wider.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Go Go Sister - EP 2
programme.desc: We search for the best ingredients from all over the world, use the skills of Michelin star chefs to make delicious and touching dishes, and deliver them warmly to your home.

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1319
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 531
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 295
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1736
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: Eat,Play,Love - EP 8
programme.desc: We invite you to eat all over Taiwan, let the "cuisine" move you and me, and make "travel" more meaningful.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1066
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Top Reporter

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 24
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 8
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 39
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1984
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.desc: Constable Fei Ren (Kalok Chow), his companion Gao Qiang (Joey Wong), and guide Murong Gongzi (Brian Chu) uncover hidden conspiracies in the mysterious Yi Jiang Palace while pursuing a spy and exposing the true mastermind behind the city's facade.

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 6
programme.desc: Through multiple time travels, modern-day bestselling historical author Shen Bu Yan (Guo Jia Nan) discovers Lu Yuan's (Zhang Ya Qin) deep patriotism and learns why she was misunderstood as the 'Demon Empress'. Determined, he sets out to clear her name.

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 7
programme.desc: Through multiple time travels, modern-day bestselling historical author Shen Bu Yan (Guo Jia Nan) discovers Lu Yuan's (Zhang Ya Qin) deep patriotism and learns why she was misunderstood as the 'Demon Empress'. Determined, he sets out to clear her name.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 7
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 1
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 2
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 2
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 7
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: The Stew of Life - EP 1
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 16
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A - EP 2
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 17
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless.
